derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from modern Latin medium aevum 'middle age' + -al

entry.tran: 中世纪的(指公元476年西罗马帝国灭亡至公元1500年左右这段时期)
entry.def: Something that is medieval relates to or was made in the period of European history between the end of the Roman Empire in 476 AD and about 1500 AD.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or belonging to the Middle Ages;
2. as if belonging to the Middle Ages; old-fashioned and unenlightened;
3. characteristic of the time of chivalry and knighthood in the Middle Ages;
